title: Riot Gifted Me A Randon Icon?
body: I was gifted this icon by riot, but none of my friends have it. Anyone know why?

replies.body: Nice!  You were rewarded this[ Cosmic Ruins icon](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017) for 33 kills during the Dark Star game mode.  Congrats.  :D
Reading Surrender at 20's Dark Star info, it's apparently from getting a total of 33 kills from all your Dark Star: Singularity games (I was confused as well but I searched the image)
